channel.title: Ahoy There! on Migrate and Modernise Scale Accelerator
channel.description: Recent content in Ahoy There! on Migrate and Modernise Scale Accelerator

item.title: Welcome to the Migrate and Modernise Scale Accelerator!
item.description: As a Microsoft partner focused on the success of small and mid-market customers in Australia & NZ, we’d like to introduce you to a new program designed to accelerate your business helping customers adopt Microsoft Azure!

item.title: Scheduled Events
item.description: Azure Landing Zones – Part 1 of the Migrate & Modernize series This webinar is the first of a series focused around migrating and modernizing workloads to Azure for Microsoft Partners.

item.title: Resources
item.description: Secrets of the Sale: How to Effectively Sell Microsoft Azure Join us as we unpack everything you need to know about selling the value of Microsoft Azure.
